name: Safety, Inc.
description: Safety, Inc. is a leading provider of safety and protective equipment, dedicated to ensuring the safety and well-being of workers across various industries. Founded in 1995, the company specializes in designing, manufacturing, and distributing high-quality personal protective equipment (PPE) and safety solutions that meet rigorous industry standards. With a commitment to innovation and quality, Safety, Inc. offers a wide range of products including safety helmets, eye protection, hearing protection, respiratory protection, and high-visibility clothing. The company serves diverse sectors such as construction, manufacturing, oil and gas, and healthcare, providing tailored safety solutions to fit the unique needs of each industry. Safety, Inc. aims to reduce workplace accidents and injuries through its extensive research and development efforts, which focus on creating cutting-edge safety technologies. The company’s mission is to promote a culture of safety and health in the workplace, helping organizations comply with safety regulations and protect their most valuable asset: their employees. With global distribution channels and a customer-centric approach, Safety, Inc. continues to expand its presence in the international market while advocating for safety training and awareness initiatives.

seo.meta_title: Safety, Inc. | Leading Provider of Safety Equipment and Solutions
seo.meta_description: Discover Safety, Inc., a pioneer in personal protective equipment and workplace safety solutions. Explore our innovative products and commitment to worker safety.

faq.answer: Safety, Inc. offers a range of personal protective equipment including safety helmets, eye protection, hearing protection, and respiratory protection.

faq.answer: Safety, Inc. is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, USA.

faq.answer: Safety, Inc. serves industries such as construction, manufacturing, oil and gas, and healthcare.
